title: Monday Mini: The Retraumatization of Crime Victims
itunes:title: Monday Mini: The Retraumatization of Crime Victims
description:
Women love true crime. But who is profiting off of it and what about the people directly impacted? 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
